mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.cat_id AS catId,A.role_id AS roleId,A.title AS title,A.sub_title AS subTitle,A.description AS description,A.pic_paths AS picPaths,A.content AS content,A.organization AS organization,A.address AS address,A.start_date AS startDate,A.end_date AS endDate,A.link_url AS linkUrl,A.attr1 AS attr1,A.attr2 AS attr2,A.is_hot AS isHot,A.is_recommend AS isRecommend,A.is_show_index AS isShowIndex,A.is_good AS isGood,A.is_top AS isTop,A.user_id AS userId,A.author AS author,A.keywords AS keywords,A.tags AS tags,A.file_id AS fileId,A.file_ids AS fileIds,A.attach_id AS attachId,A.scans AS scans,A.hits AS hits,A.allow_comment AS allowComment,A.orgin AS orgin,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

sql.if: AND (DATE(A.end_date) >= date_sub(NOW(), interval 7 day) OR DATE(A.start_date) >= date_sub(NOW(), interval 7 day))
AND c.comment_type_code = 'comment_article' AND c.user_id = #{authorId} AND c.content IS NOT NULL
LEFT JOIN comment c ON A.id = c.object_id

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
